Trade/Device Name(s): TD-4268 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TaiDoc TD-4268 Blood Glucose Monitoring System and TD-4268 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: TD-4268 Blood Glucose Monitoring System is intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood by a single person for self-testing at home; TD-4268 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System is intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary, venous, and neonatal whole blood for multiple patient use in professional healthcare settings
